title: Any Content creators / video editors want to join a creators group?
body:
so I've been planning to start up a creators group for some time, I'm just curious, how many people would be interested?

we'd cover the basics of editing, we'd discuss things like branding and making the most of youtube's algorithms, and even collaborate if people were interested.


If you're interested, let me know. We'll likely start up a facebook based group for a little while, see where we go from there.

edit; my content, for comparison; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7hRFU3_ap1Y&index=4&list=PLvSQKBJ4bDPV6VtPuNmlMqmcOPvcNNDLF

replies.body:
All I do is spectate bronze games and try and help them improve.

But I do it to help, and its fun.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=2QzqKNhF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T06:30:24.439+0000)
>
> All I do is spectate bronze games and try and help them improve.
> 

and you make videos of it? nice man.

You say videos.
I say me getting upset for about 20-40 mins XD

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=2QzqKNhF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-26T06:30:24.439+0000)
>
> All I do is spectate bronze games and try and help them improve.
> 
> But I do it to help, and its fun.

How big are your video file size's for your 40 min games? also what are your render settings?

About 30-60 gigs.
I use fraps and after effects.

Hey Man! I'm in for this Content Creators group! I need motivation to help me edit videos, so if this group works it would help me stop procrastinating :D 

I do edits on my channel "Euphener" But I make funny edits such as Pewdiepie or Sp4zie, I may have a lot to learn, but I'm totally in for this. 

Just tell me when your ready to make this thing work :D I'm happy to take management over something if it will be a big job for you!

Pure fraps recordings take a LOT of space. 

One of the tips I give is that for slightly lower quality and a lot lower space, use OBS local recording

I started making league montages about 2 months ago but I hardly know anything about editing and I'm basically just learning as I go
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYXmP-GOGdhpw0H4DLV23tQ

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=2QzqKNhF,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-26T06:54:03.032+0000)
>
> I started making league montages about 2 months ago but I hardly know anything about editing and I'm basically just learning as I go
> https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYXmP-GOGdhpw0H4DLV23tQ

it's a good start, man. If you're interested in learning more, throw me an add.
The silver lining here is that you're not the one playing in that ELO I guess :3
